welcome.title: Set up Vibe Remote
welcome.subtitle: Your local AI coding assistant for Slack.
welcome.feature1: Runs locally. Your code stays on your computer.
welcome.feature2: SaaS mode uses a cloud relay for Slack delivery, but does not store message content.
welcome.feature3: Self-host mode runs entirely locally via Slack Socket Mode.

modeSelection.title: Choose Mode
modeSelection.saasDescription: OAuth install + cloud relay + local execution (coming soon).
modeSelection.selfHostDescription: Use your own Slack app + Socket Mode tokens.

slackConfig.title: Slack Configuration
slackConfig.saasDescription: Authorize the official Slack app and wait for workspace binding.
slackConfig.selfHostDescription: Create a Slack app and configure tokens for Socket Mode.
slackConfig.oauthPrompt: Open OAuth in your browser to authorize Vibe Remote with your Slack workspace.
slackConfig.afterAuth: After authorization, return here to continue.
slackConfig.step1Description: Click the button below to create a new Slack app with pre-configured permissions.
slackConfig.step1Tip: The manifest will be auto-filled. Just select your workspace and click Create.
slackConfig.step2Description: Install the app to your workspace and copy the Bot Token.
slackConfig.step2Item1: In your new app, go to 'OAuth & Permissions'
slackConfig.step3Description: Generate an App-Level Token for Socket Mode connection.
slackConfig.step3Warning: Keep this token secure. It provides full Socket Mode access.
slackConfig.step4Description: Validate your tokens to ensure everything is configured correctly.
slackConfig.step4Item3: The bot will now receive messages from this channel
slackConfig.step4Tip: You can also right-click a channel and select 'Add apps'.

agentDetection.title: Agent Configuration
agentDetection.subtitle: Detect local CLI paths and choose enabled backends.

channelList.title: Channel Settings
channelList.subtitle: Enable channels and configure per-channel routing.
channelList.accessPolicyHint: Channels are enabled only when checked below.
channelList.noChannelsFound: No channels found. Check token or invite bot.
channelList.addTokenFirst: Add a Slack bot token first to load channels.

summary.title: Review & Finish
summary.subtitle: Confirm settings and start Vibe Remote.
summary.requireMentionHint: Bot only responds when @mentioned in channels
summary.tipStartCommandDesc: Type /start in any enabled channel, or @mention the bot to open the control panel.
summary.tipAgentSwitchDesc: Prefix your message with AgentName: to route to a specific agent. E.g., "Plan: Design the API"
summary.tipThreadDesc: Each thread is an isolated session. Start multiple threads for parallel tasks.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your local Vibe Remote instance.
dashboard.errorRetryLimitHint: Auto-retry with 'continue' when LLM stream errors occur (0 = no retry)

logs.title: System Logs
logs.searchPlaceholder: Search logs by message, logger, or timestamp...
